rss.channel:
60 Let's Talk About Jesus http://www.letstalkaboutjesus.com/index.html en-us Wayne Monbleau, Loving Grace Ministries 2006 Loving Grace Ministries Wayne Monbleau Let's Talk About Jesus is a Daily Christian call in counseling radio show heard six days a week from Maine to Maryland. Wayne Monbleau has been hosting this show for 28 years, which makes this the longest running talk show in the country. On the days Wayne is live, if you have a question about the scripture, a counselling need, or a word of testimony, you can call the show toll free at 1.800.523.5401 Eastern time. Show times are weekdays from 11:30am to 12:30pm, and Saturdays from 11am to 12pm.
Wayne Monbleau loving@lovinggrace.org
